name: Rider Ex
description:
Experience what it's like to truly be the highway king.

- Three turns as one character? This is HERESY.

- Rider's other gears allows him to prevent damage as well as regenerate all that missing health.

- Many more offensive options, with fewer locked behind stance swapping.

- Fight back against insurmountable odds!

- Rider lost his chill amidst the mass murder.

Credits go to all the people who worked on the original Rider, Paralysa and Father Kuro for spritework, AlterReaper for the Rodriguez crew, XdXekn for his mutilated hart and myself for the battle animations as well as Rider in general.
